content:
Version 2 of the database has added the following features:

1. The "Cancel General Request" and "Cancel Special Request" feature, which allows staff to cancel their general or special requests. The management team will review and approve the cancellation request accordingly.
2. The "Date Submitted" field has been changed from "Custom Date" to "Current Date and Time". Staff can no longer change the submitted date to a past date. This adds more control to the system and ensures the credibility of the data involved in the database.
